Congressman McHenry Weekly Update Congressman McHenry Weekly Update Supporting Our Nation's TroopsOn Thursday, the House voted overwhelmingly to pass this year's National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). This bipartisan bill helps fulfill Congress's duty to provide for a strong national defense.

Honored to Serve as Chairman of the House Financial Services Committee I am honored to have been selected by my colleagues in the House Republican Conference to serve as Chairman of the House Financial Services Committee for the 118th Congress. As Chairman, I will pursue innovative solutions to help rebuild our economy to its pre-pandemic heights.
It was not lost on anyone that this business owned by a leading Jewish citizen was one of the world's leading manufacturers of what, you may ask? Christmas ornaments.

? Our unsecured border is putting Americans at risk & they deserve answers. My #NC colleagues joined me in demanding answers from [[user]] & [[user]] on the unsettling rise in border encounters with those on the Terrorist Screening Dataset. ? [[url]] [[url]]

Included in this year's NDAA is a well-deserved pay raise for our troops and programs that help prepare our military to combat the growing threat of China. It also continues our efforts to defend our nation and allies from Russian aggression, and reverses President Biden's reckless cuts to our national security.

I also look forward to leading my colleagues in focusing our efforts on conducting appropriate and aggressive oversight of the Biden administration, as well as pursuing bipartisan legislation to put Americans back in control of their personal financial data.
